title: Upgrade to VIP
content:
If you upgrade to DvS VIP, you will receive the following perks:

- Queue Skipping
- Priority Support
- Tier 2 Raid Insurance
- Access to VIP Discord channel
- Special VIP Events / Giveaways

title: CashApp
content: We accept CashApp payments. Please send $10.00 to `$DvSCollective` and include your Discord User ID as well as your Xbox / PSN username in the seller notes. We will manually give VIP from there.

title: Credit/Debit Card (WHOP)
content: We accept Credit/Debit Card payments via a third-party service known as 'WHOP'. Please send $10.00 by clicking the button below and follow the steps. We will have to give you VIP manually after your purchase.
